card: display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:10px; max-width: 387px; background-color: #d5d5d5; box-shadow: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); border: 1px solid transparent; text-decoration: none; border-radius:20px;
image: border-radius:15px 0px;  background-color: #4caf4f; height: 100px;  width: 100%; object-fit: cover; object-fit: cover;
title: color: #111827; font-size: 1.125rem; line-height: 1.75rem; font-weight: 600; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
action: display: flex; margin-top: 1rem; color: #ffffff; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.25rem; font-weight: 500; align-items: center; gap: 0.25rem;background-color: #2563EB; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 4px;
